description:
DeSmog writer Justin Nobel’s new book explores how workers bear the brunt of the oil and gas industry’s hidden radioactive waste.

The post Big Oil’s Dangerous Radioactive Secret appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Big Oil’s Dangerous Radioactive Secret

description:
The UK has been accused of “helping Russia pay for its war on Ukraine” by continuing to import record amounts of refined oil from countries processing Kremlin fossil fuels.  Government data shows that imports of refined oil from India, China and Turkey amounted to £2.2 billion in 2023, the same record value as the previous […]

The post UK Accused of ‘Helping Russia’ as Refined Oil Imports From ‘Laundering’ Countries Remain at Record High appeared first on DeSmog.
title: UK Accused of ‘Helping Russia’ as Refined Oil Imports From ‘Laundering’ Countries Remain at Record High

description:
The Financial Times and Reuters have taken down advertorials paid for by Saudi Aramco that showcased the oil giant’s preferred climate solutions. The content, which was produced by FT and Reuters’ in-house ad agencies, disappeared following a February 20 complaint to UK regulators that the FT ads mislead readers by depicting the world’s biggest oil […]

The post Financial Times, Reuters Pull Saudi Aramco-sponsored Climate Content  appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Financial Times, Reuters Pull Saudi Aramco-sponsored Climate Content
